ideas.title: The Bourke Street Bake-Off Riot
ideas.premise: A wholesome bake-off devolves into a Mad Max style free-for-all over lamingtons and vanilla slices.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes twee bake-off with chaotic Melbourne tram-stop brawl absurdity.

ideas.title: West Gate Bridge Traffic Forecast
ideas.premise: The weather report shows clear skies, but the traffic report shows the West Gate Bridge completely gridlocked with cartoonishly frustrated drivers.
ideas.why_funny: Highlights the eternal Melbourne struggle: beautiful weather, unbearable traffic.

ideas.title: The Myki Machine Prophecy
ideas.premise: A fortune teller uses a faulty Myki machine to predict the local government's infrastructure plans with eerie accuracy.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at both unreliable public transport and council planning inefficiencies.

ideas.title: Collingwood Cheer Squad Strategy Session
ideas.premise: The Collingwood cheer squad plans their elaborate routine using complex tactical diagrams and spreadsheets.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerates the seriousness of supporting a sports team to a ridiculous extreme.

ideas.title: Expansion Anxiety
ideas.premise: A small milk bar owner nervously watches a massive Coles supermarket being built across the street, sweating profusely.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable fear of small businesses competing against large corporations in Melbourne.

headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title
